row.process:
! Populate all DCS tools parameters :SET &DCS_SETTINGS# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PUB.DCS.SETTINGS" :SET &ANALYTICS_SETTINGS# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PUB.SETTINGS"
:SET &ANALYTICS_BACKEND_API_KEY# = GET_VAR (&ANALYTICS_SETTINGS#, "ANALYTICS_BACKEND_API_KEY") :SET &ANALYTICS_BACKEND_API_URL# = GET_VAR (&ANALYTICS_SETTINGS#, "ANALYTICS_BACKEND_URL") :SET &ANALYTICS_BACKEND_API_URL# = STR_CAT(&ANALYTICS_BACKEND_API_URL#, "/telemetry") :SET &DCS_COMSUMER_ID# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "DATAEXPORT_CONSUMER_ID") :SET &DCS_EXPORTLOG_ENABLED# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "DATAEXPORT_EXPORTLOG_ENABLED") :SET &DCS_EXPORTLOG_FOLDER# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "DATAEXPORT_EXPORTLOG_FOLDER") :SET &DCS_FILESIZE_LIMIT_MB# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "DATAEXPORT_FILESIZE_LIMIT_MB") :SET &DCS_OUTPUT_FOLDER# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "DATAEXPORT_OUTPUT_FOLDER") :SET &DCS_ARCHIVE_ENABLED# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "DATASEND_ARCHIVE_ENABLED") :SET &DCS_ARCHIVE_FOLDER# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "DATASEND_ARCHIVE_FOLDER") :SET &DCS_ARCHIVE_KEEP_DAYS# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "DATASHARE_ARCHIVE_KEEP_DAYS") :SET &DCS_EXPORT_ENABLED# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "DATASHARE_EXPORT_ENABLED") :SET &DCS_EXPORT_KEEP_DAYS# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "DATASHARE_EXPORT_KEEP_DAYS") :SET &DCS_SEND_ENABLED# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "DATASHARE_SEND_ENABLED") :SET &DCS_LIQUIDFILES_BASEURL# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "LIQUIDFILES_BASE_URL") :SET &DCS_LIQUIDFILES_FILEDROP# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "LIQUIDFILES_FILEDROP") :SET &DCS_LIQUIDFILES_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "LIQUIDFILES_MESSAGE") :SET &DCS_LIQUIDFILES_SENDER# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "LIQUIDFILES_SENDER") :SET &DCS_LIQUIDFILES_SUBJECT# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "LIQUIDFILES_SUBJECT") ! timeouts tuning :SET &DCS_TIMEOUT_DCS_CONNECT# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "TIMEOUT_DCS_CONNECT") :SET &DCS_TIMEOUT_DCS_SOCKET# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "TIMEOUT_DCS_SOCKET") :SET &DCS_TIMEOUT_LIQUIDFILES_CONNECT# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "TIMEOUT_LIQUIDFILES_CONNECT") :SET &DCS_TIMEOUT_LIQUIDFILES_RW# = GET_VAR (&DCS_SETTINGS#, "TIMEOUT_LIQUIDFILES_READWRITE")
